sentence.Network_en: The piezoelectricity type acceleration instrument is one kind of commonly used accelerometer.

sentence.Network_en: This paper mainly introduces the calibration method of piezoelectricity pressure sensors in the pressure field testing.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍压力场测试中所采用的压电压力传感器的标定方法.

sentence.Network_en: The text is mainly about the damping mechanism of polymer base piezoelectricity intellectual damping materials.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要综述了聚合物基压电智能阻尼材料的阻尼机理.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2009年9月28日 - 乔治亚理工学院(Georgia Tech)的材料科学家王中林的研究目标就是希望能够通过利用压电现象(piezoelectricity)的原理造出最小的发电机,从而为纳米世界提供.
piezoelectric driver 压电推进器piezoelectricity 压电现象，压电学piezoelectric transducer 压电换能器
压电效应压电效应(piezoelectricity)是1880 年由两位法国科学家居里兄弟皮尔(P.Curie)与杰克斯(J.Curie)研究石英晶体时发现的,有正压电效应和逆压电效应之分 [ 3.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek piezein 'press, squeeze' + electricity

means.word_mean: 1. electricity produced by mechanical pressure on certain crystals (notably quartz or Rochelle salt); alternatively, electrostatic stress produces a change in the linear dimensions of the crystal
